answers.answer: I get headaches to a lot am 14 + 2 pregnant  it gets really bad I try no to take any Tylenol bt yesturday I had to take one since my headache was so bad try to relax enjoy your pregnancy ! I just think I get headaches Cuz of the heat

Im 16weeks 5days an i get alot of headaches all the time i have more days with pain then without. I jus try to relax shut my eyes an drink water. Im not sure wat else to do. Im not one for taking medicine while pregnant id rather be in pain.
I checked my sugar and it's good, so it can't be because of it being too high/low...I'm the same when pregnant, I stick it out rather than taking something.

question: I have constant headaches throughout the day, almost every day. I'm 18 weeks and was diagnosed with gestational diabetes, idk if that's related, anyone else get headaches throughout their pregnancy and why is that?
title: headache
